sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"收缩，压缩"之意。
means: condense ： 指将东西压缩得更紧密、紧凑，但不失去原有的内容。
compress ： 指把乱而不成形的东西压成一定形状。
contract ： 主要指以内、外部力量进行紧缩，也可用作引申。
shrink ： 侧重指因收缩而达不到原有的长度、体积或容积。

sentence.Network_en: We have learnt how to condense serious messages into short, self-contained sentences.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们已经学会了如何把重要的信息压缩成简短独立的句子。

sentence.Network_en: Huge quantities of steam may be erupted and then condense.
sentence.Network_cn: 大量水气会喷发出来,然后冷凝成雨.

sentence.Network_en: Condense the mixture by boiling off some of the liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过煮沸,蒸发掉一些液体,使混合液浓缩.

condemn vt. 谴责,指责;判刑condense vt. 压缩,使缩短condition n. 状况,状态;环境

...ing)与冷凝(condensation)是属于相变化的热传送 (C)冷凝现象分为滴状冷凝(dropwise condensation)及薄膜.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French condenser or Latin condensare, from condensus 'very thick', from con- 'completely' + densus 'dense'

entry.tran: 压缩,精简(尤指文章或讲话)
entry.def: If you condense something, especially a piece of writing or speech, you make it shorter, usually by including only the most important parts.

example.ex: We have learnt how to condense serious messages into short, self-contained sentences...
example.tran: 我们已经学会了如何把重要的信息压缩成简短独立的句子。

example.ex: The English translation may have been condensed into a single more readable book.
example.tran: 英译本可能被压缩成了更具可读性的单行本。

entry.def: When a gas or vapour condenses, or is condensed, it changes into a liquid.

example.ex: Water vapour condenses to form clouds...
The compressed gas is cooled and condenses into a liquid...
example.tran: 压缩气体经冷却凝结成液态。

means.word_mean: 1. undergo condensation; change from a gaseous to a liquid state and fall in drops;

sentences.sentence: "The acid distills at a specific temperature"
"condense the contents of a book into a summary"

means.word_mean: 4. cause a gas or vapor to change into a liquid;

sentences.sentence: "All our planets condensed out of the same material"
"Congress condensed the three-year plan into a six-month plan"

auth_sentence.content: Then let cold night air condense its water there.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then let cold night air condense its water there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then let cold night air condense its water there.

auth_sentence.content: When it reached its boiling point, it will condense.
auth_sentence.res_content: When it reached its boiling point, it will condense.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When it reached its boiling point, it will condense.

auth_sentence.content: Cooler temperatures condense the moisture to form clouds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cooler temperatures condense the moisture to form clouds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cooler temperatures condense the moisture to form clouds.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dens变浓厚+e→adj.浓厚的,密集的,稠密的
densi=dens变浓厚+meter测量→n.比重计, 密度计
dens变浓厚+ity性质,特性→n.密集,密度,浓度

sentences.en: Steam is condensed in the condenser.

means.word_mean: 简说, 摘要, 简述

jushi.english: Condense the mixture by boiling off some of the liquid.
jushi.chinese: 通过煮沸蒸发掉一些液体,使混合液变浓。
